levels.label: Level 6
levels.extraInfo: Sometimes you roll on 3-2 if you have a lot of pairs, maybe 10-20g depending on your health

levels.label: Level 7
levels.extraInfo: Typically roll a little bit after reaching level 7 because you need to stabilize your board if you have pairs or if you are low hp

levels.label: Level 8
levels.extraInfo: Usually roll 30-50g on level 8 unless your board is already 2* or if you are 80hp+

levels.label: Level 9
levels.extraInfo: Roll most of your gold when you hit level 9 unless you are doing something very specific
